product_name: Sherpani Lima Cross Body Bag - Women's
long_description: The Sherpani Lima Cross Body shoulder bag is an organizational wonder. A slim design and multiple organizational pockets make it super functional. Zippered main compartment. Gusseted middle section secures with both magnetic and buckle closures; opens to expose a zip stash pocket and credit card slot holder. Exterior pockets include 2 zip pockets and a rear drop-in pocket. Adjustable shoulder strap allows you to wear bag across your body or over your shoulder. Made of a soft and durable cotton/poly fabric blend. Contrast stitching and zipper pulls, and brushed metal buckles add style to the Sherpani Lima Cross Body shoulder bag.
short_description: The Sherpani Lima Cross Body shoulder bag is an organizational wonder. A slim design and multiple organizational pockets make it super functional.
